title: Integrative Medicine | Aurora Health Care
description: Integrative medicine treats the whole person with services that include integrative primary care, chiropractic care, acupuncture, massage therapy and more.
cleaned_text: Health care can be daunting, but choosing a provider who partners with you on your journey to better health brings peace of mind. Together, you'll take a comprehensive look at all aspects of your lifestyle - body, mind and spirit - to prevent illness and promote healing. Integrative medicine - also known as complementary medicine - is the thoughtful, evidence-based combination of modern or conventional medicine with holistic medicine. We partner with you to achieve optimal health and personal balance. We offer the best integrative health services to provide you with the outstanding experience you've come to expect. Our integrative medicine physicians, nurse practitioners and physician assistants have fellowship training in integrative medicine. Creating balance is essential for living a healthy fulfilled life. That's why we treat more than just symptoms. Cancer treatment can present its own physical and mental challenges. At Aurora, you have access to a range of integrative medicine therapies designed to nurture your mind and body. Integrative therapies are made available to help manage your fatigue, stress, pain and nausea, and support your well-being. [See how we can help treat your mind and body](/services/integrative-medicine/integrative-cancer-care) Integrative primary care Achieve an optimal state of health and well-being when you work with our team of integrative medicine practitioners. Integrative medicine Centers for Wellbeing Get massage therapy, acupuncture, chiropractic care and integrative family medicine at a location near you. Integrative therapies & orthopedics Our chiropractors, acupuncturists and massage therapists work with our [sports medicine](/services/sports-health/services-treatment) doctors and [orthopedic surgeons](/services/orthopedics/services/orthopedic-medicine-surgery) to get at the source of your pain. Comforting Hands Fund Help us invest in health care research and provide integrative medicine to the uninsured and underinsured by donating to the Comforting Hands Fund. Prepare for surgery and recover quicker with the mind-body practices you'll learn in Help Yourself Heal, our free online course. We help you live well. And we're here for you in person and online.
